abstract.description: Implementation of a multi-hop BLE chat system using ESP32S3 microcontrollers.

detail.context: Demonstrate multi-hop BLE communication for small networked devices.
detail.approach: Developed firmware and logic for message passing between ESP32 nodes.
detail.solution_description: Users can chat across multiple ESP32 devices using BLE multi-hop network.
detail.cons_and_improvements_ideas: UI minimal; only worked in class environment.
